惈字的基本解释

惈
guǒ
果敢：“风俗以韰惈为嫿，人物以戕害为艺。”

惈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǒ］
［《廣韻》古火切，上果，見。］
亦作“婐2”。
果敢；勇敢。

惈字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　惈； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页390第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古火切。與果同。敢勇也。【倉頡篇】殺敵爲果。【孫炎曰】惈決之惈，今通作果。

惈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
惈字的起名意思

果敢。

Arrogant
Basic explanation of words
Arrogant
guǒ
Courageous: "The custom is based on 韰惈婳, and the characters use harm as an art."
Arrogant
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǒ］
["Guangyun" ancient fire cut, fruit, see. ]
Also known as "婐2".
Resolute; brave.
Arrogant
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　惈; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 390 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ancient fire cut. The same as the fruit. Courageous too. [Cangjie Chapter] Killing the enemy is the result. [Sun Yan said] The resolute decision, today is the fruit.
